wikipedia_page.main: Sidney Frederick Gueran (2 October 1916 – 18 September 1944) was an English footballer who made three first-team appearances for Southampton in 1937. His career was cut short when he was killed during the Battle of Arnhem.

link_mentions.page: List of footballers killed during World War II
response: * Sid Gueran – played for Southampton (1936–1938). He was killed serving with the Royal Engineers' 1st Parachute Squadron in action in the Battle of Arnhem on 18 September 1944 aged 27.

link_mentions.page: St George's Church of England Foundation School
